doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Izazul Hoque
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Izazul Hoque is a Liver Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), MD (Hepatology). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Hepatology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Moon Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Izazul Hoque at Moon Hospital, Comilla is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Shahid Khawaja Nizamuddin Road, Jhautola, Cumilla

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Forhad Abedin
doctor.specialty: Liver Diseases, Medicine, Transplant & Liver Cancer Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Forhad Abedin is a highly qualified Liver Diseases, Medicine, Transplant & Liver Cancer Specialist in Cumilla, holding an MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), and FRCP (Glasgow), along with a Post Doctoral Fellowship in Transplant Hepatology from Rela Hospital, Chennai, India. He currently serves as an Assistant Professor of Hepatology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Abedin specializes in treating liver cirrhosis, hepatitis B and C, fatty liver disease, liver cancer, portal hypertension, ascites, jaundice, and complex hepatobiliary disorders. He provides consultations at Moon Hospital, Cumilla, located at Shahid Khawaja Nizamuddin Road, Jhautola, from 2pm to 8pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

chamber.address: Shahid Khawaja Nizamuddin Road, Jhautola, Cumilla

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Kamrul Millat
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kamrul Millat is a Liver Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology). He is a Consultant, Hepatology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Comilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Kamrul Millat at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Comilla is 5pm to 8pm (Mon & Friday).
